author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CENTER OF BERYL PASSING SOUTHWEST OF GRAND CAYMAN ISLAND... ...STRONG WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED  IN THE CAYMAN ISLANDS THIS MORNING...
summary:
...CENTER OF BERYL PASSING SOUTHWEST OF GRAND CAYMAN ISLAND... ...STRONG WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED  IN THE CAYMAN ISLANDS THIS MORNING...
 As of 8:00 AM EDT Thu Jul 4
 the center of Beryl was located near 18.7, -81.8
 with movement WNW at 20 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 968 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Beryl (AT2/AL022024)
